Question.Subject: how can i create my free website?
Question.Content:
i have already seen websites like
http://www.shutterfly.com http://www.weebly.com
but here i have some limitations like i cant bring my own theme. is there any websites like the above? or which allows me to bring my own background inside or can publish my own website if i create one for free?
Question.ChosenAnswer: http://www.freewebhosting.comxa.com/ allows you to put all of your own stuff on your website. It comes with a free website builder and templates that you can use as a basis for your site if you want to you can then edit the images etc to make the site how you want. You can even get into the html code and change that if you want. And it is free with no ads.
